title: 求会安装cjb的进来看看！！！！

   求教 怎么安装这个cjb          version below 1.61. Install the ModLoader or forge
2. install PlayerAPI
3.Put the CJB.zip inside the zip.4. put the other MOD at mods directory5. put the textures file in your texture zip fileif you do not have custom texture, just zip the textures directory.and using that texture file in the game
